text: Onon, ki dar ʙorai ruzi qijomat ʙa Alloh duruƣ meʙandand, ci gumon kardaand? Ojo gumon mekunand, ki ʙo in kirdorason gunohonason omurzida mesavad? Alloh fazli xudro ʙa mardumon arzoni medorad, ki onhoro zud ʙa azoʙ namegirad, ʙalki dar dunjo muhlatason medihad, vale ʙestarinason sukr namegujand va ʙa xud vaznini meorand va halolkardai Allohro ʙar xud harom mekunand
